Are you sure the template you are editing is the same that the page is using? I mean, if you do some other changes, can yoi see them in the page?
Hi Antonio, yeah I am sure, I am having trouble with this theme even in editor , it doesn't not change the color of the background :man-shrugging::sweat_smile:
Hey <@U01AS49TB0T>. Thatâ€™s great news.  I can confirm that hiding templates in the child theme seems to be working now.  Thanks again for looking into this!

Anyone here get annoyed that you can't control the stacking order of images on mobile when using the drag and drop editor?

I wrote a short article on how to implement a set-it-and-forget-it solution. Check it out <https://disgravity.notion.site/How-to-Stack-Images-on-Mobile-in-HubSpot-CMS-Correctly-18d3b484e0834fb4b1fe1e06ee90a45a?pvs=4|here>.
